channel.title: Home help please someone it wont take to long!
channel.description: Hi i was wondering how to change the home like put the starting are and all the npcs and stuff in a diffrent area how would i do this

item.title: Home help please someone it wont take to long!
item.dc:creator: @Happyman Happyman
item.description:
@Happyman wrote:

A.Change Starting Coordinates:

  1. Go into player.java

  2. Search for // initial x and y coordinates of the player

  3. Should see something along these lines // initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; teleportToX = XXXX; teleportToY = YYYY;

With XXXX and YYYY being numbers

  1. Modify the XXXX to the new X coordinates and modify YYYY to the new Y Coordinates

  2. Save>Compile>Run and that should be it

B. Change NPC Locations:

  1. Go into Autospawn to CFG

  2. Change NPCâ€™s coordinates from there

The best way to find coordinates is with ::mypos

Read full topic
item.source: Home help please someone it wont take to long!
